summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to J Epstein & Co Inc for transportation and special handling charges. The invoice details the services provided, the amount due, and the payment terms.

persons.name: J Epstein
persons.context: J Epstein is listed as the recipient of the invoice for services rendered by FedEx.

persons.name: John Alessi
persons.context: John Alessi is mentioned as the sender of a package associated with the invoice.

connections.description: John Alessi is associated with a package sent from J Epstein & Co Inc, indicating a working relationship.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for J Epstein & Co Inc.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: The package was delivered to J Epstein & Co Inc.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-554-62955, dated June 14, 1999.
The total amount due is USD 39.70 for transportation and special handling charges.
The invoice indicates that the payment is due by June 29, 1999.
The package was picked up on June 8, 1999, and delivered on June 9, 1999.
John Alessi is mentioned as the sender of a package related to the invoice.
